languages.text: Чем активнее становились враги Пустотного братства, тем более могучие союзники им требовались. Старая Ризза, а за ней и другие пираты, погружалась в нечестивую веру Темных богов, и корабли ее не трогали суровые варп-шторма. Прежде обвинение пиратов в поголовной приверженности Губительным силам было пропагандистским преувеличением, но с каждым годом оно все сильнее походило на реальность.

As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.
languages.original_text: Чем активнее становились враги Пустотного братства, тем более могучие союзники им требовались. Старая Ризза, а за ней и другие пираты, погружалась в нечестивую веру Темных богов, и корабли ее не трогали суровые варп-шторма. Прежде обвинение пиратов в поголовной приверженности Губительным силам было пропагандистским преувеличением, но с каждым годом оно все сильнее походило на реальность.

traits.locale_text: As their enemies became more and more active, the Fellowship of the Void needed more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, immersed in the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships were free from the damage caused by harsh Warp Storms. If prior accusations of totally widespread worship of Ruinous Powers among the pirates were full of propagandist exaggeration, now with every passing year they were closer to the truth.

As their enemies became more and more active, the Fellowship of the Void needed more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, immersed in the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships were free from the damage caused by harsh Warp Storms. If prior accusations of totally widespread worship of Ruinous Powers among the pirates were full of propagandist exaggeration, now with every passing year they were closer to the truth.

As their enemies became more and more active, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they were closer to the truth.

As their enemies became more and more active, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they were closer to the truth.

As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

languages.text: 由于敌人变得越来越猖狂，虚空协联也需要更加强大的盟友。老莱萨和其他海盗一样，接受了黑暗诸神的亵渎教义，猛烈的亚空间风暴再也无法对她的舰船造成伤害。如果说，先前关于海盗普遍崇拜毁灭之力的指控可能过分夸大，那么随着时间的流逝，这样的说法越来越接近事实了。
languages.original_text: As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

traits.locale_text: 由于敌人变得越来越活跃，虚空协联也需要更加强大的盟友。老莱萨和其他海盗一样，接受了黑暗诸神的亵渎教义，猛烈的亚空间风暴再也无法对她的舰船造成伤害。如果说，先前关于海盗普遍崇拜毁灭之力的指控可能过分夸大，那么随着时间的流逝，这样的说法越来越接近事实了。

languages.text: Als ihre Feinde immer aktiver wurden, erkannten die Gefährten der Leere, dass sie auf mächtigere Verbündete angewiesen waren. Die alte Ryzza wandte sich der blasphemischen Doktrin der Dunklen Götter zu, und andere Piraten taten es ihr gleich. Ihre Schiffe wurden immun gegen den Schaden schwerer Warpstürme. Frühere Anschuldigungen, dass die Piraten die Mächte der Zerstörung anbeten würden, waren gnadenlos übertrieben gewesen, doch mit jedem neuen Jahr entsprachen sie mehr und mehr der Wahrheit.
languages.original_text: As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

traits.locale_text: Als die Feinde der Gefährten der Leere immer aktiver wurden, erkannten die Piraten, dass sie auf mächtigere Verbündete angewiesen waren. Die alte Ryzza wandte sich der blasphemischen Doktrin der Dunklen Götter zu, und andere Piraten taten es ihr gleich. Ihre Schiffe wurden immun gegen den Schaden schwerer Warpstürme. Frühere Anschuldigungen, dass die Piraten die Mächte der Zerstörung anbeten würden, waren gnadenlos übertrieben gewesen, doch mit jedem neuen Jahr entsprachen sie mehr und mehr der Wahrheit.

languages.text: La Communauté du vide eut besoin d'alliés plus puissants à mesure que ses ennemis se faisaient plus actifs. La vieille Ryzza, suivie par d'autres pirates, embrassa la doctrine blasphématoire des Dieux Sombres et ses vaisseaux devinrent ainsi invulnérables aux dégâts des violentes tempêtes Warp. Si les accusations passées concernant l'adoration généralisée des Puissances de la Ruine au sein des pirates avaient été grandement exagérées, elles devinrent peu à peu plus fondées.
languages.original_text: As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

traits.locale_text: La Communauté du vide eut besoin d'alliés plus puissants à mesure que ses ennemis se faisaient plus actifs. La vieille Ryzza, suivie par d'autres pirates, embrassa la doctrine blasphématoire des Dieux Sombres et ses vaisseaux devinrent ainsi invulnérables aux dégâts des violentes tempêtes Warp. Si les accusations passées concernant l'adoration généralisée des Puissances de la Ruine au sein des pirates avaient été grandement exagérées, elles devinrent peu à peu plus fondées.

languages.text: Al mismo tiempo que sus enemigos aumentaban su actividad, la Hermandad del Vacío necesitaba aliados más poderosos. La vieja Ryzza, pronto seguida de otros piratas, recurrió a la doctrina blasfema de los Dioses Oscuros, y sus naves se volvieron inmunes a los daños de las devastadoras tormentas de disformidad. Aunque antaño la creencia de que los piratas adoraban a los Poderes Ruinosos era una grandísima exageración, con cada año estaba más cerca de ser cierta.
languages.original_text: As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

traits.locale_text: Al mismo tiempo que sus enemigos se volvían cada vez más activos, la Hermandad del Vacío necesitaba aliados más poderosos. La vieja Ryzza, pronto seguida de otros piratas, recurrió a la doctrina blasfema de los Dioses Oscuros, y sus naves se volvieron inmunes a los daños de las devastadoras tormentas de disformidad. Aunque antaño la creencia de que los piratas adoraban a los Poderes Ruinosos era una grandísima exageración, con cada año está más cerca de ser cierta.

languages.text: 敵の活動が活発化するなかで、虚空の仲間はさらに強力な味方を求めるようになった。老年のリザが暗黒神の汚れた教義を海賊たちとともに受け入れたことで、彼女の船団は激しい歪みの嵐による損傷を免れるようになった。かつて、海賊には禍つ神々への信仰が蔓延しているという訴えがあり、そこには本来大きな誇張が含まれていたのだが、年を経るごとにその主張は真実味を増していった。
languages.original_text: As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

traits.locale_text: 敵の活動が活発化するなかで、虚空の仲間はさらに強力な味方を求めるようになった。老年のリザが暗黒神の汚れた教義を海賊たちとともに受け入れたことで、彼女の船団は激しい歪みの嵐による損傷を免れるようになった。かつて、海賊には禍つ神々への信仰が蔓延しているという訴えがあり、そこには本来大きな誇張が含まれていたのだが、年を経るごとにその主張は真実味を増していった。

languages.text: Uçsuz Kardeşliği, düşman faaliyetleri arttıkça daha güçlü müttefiklere ihtiyaç duyar hâle geldi. Koca Ryzza, onu takip eden diğer korsanlarla birlikte Kara Tanrıların kâfirce doktrinlerine kucak açtı. Bunun sonucunda gemisi, güçlü öteboyut fırtınalarının sebep olduğu hasara bağışıklık kazandı. Korsanların Yıkıcı Güçler'e tapındığına dair suçlamalar son derece abartılı olagelse de bu söylentiler, her geçen yıl gerçeğe giderek daha da yaklaştı.
languages.original_text: As their enemies' activities ramped up, the Fellowship of the Void required more powerful allies. Old Ryzza, with other pirates following suit, embraced the blasphemous doctrine of the Dark Gods, and her ships became immune to the damage caused by harsh warp storms. If prior accusations of the pirates' widespread worship of the Ruinous Powers had been wildly exaggerated, with every passing year they became closer to the truth.

traits.locale_text: Düşmanlarının faaliyetleri arttıkça, Uçsuz Kardeşliği daha güçlü müttefiklere ihtiyaç duyar hâle geldi. Koca Ryzza, onu takip eden diğer korsanlarla birlikte Karanlık Tanrıların kâfirce doktrinlerine kucak açtı ve gemisi, sert öteboyut fırtınalarının sebep olduğu hasara karşı bağışıklık kazandı. Korsanların Yıkıcı Güçlere tapındığına dair suçlamalar son derece abartılı olagelmiştir ancak her geçen yıl bu söylentiler gerçeğe giderek daha da fazla yaklaştı.
